{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3070851,"name":"Kavin","username":"Kavar918","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kavar918/{size}/65669_2.png","created_at":"2022-06-29T15:12:54.595Z","cooked":"

Hello Chief Delphi!

Following our successful CAD Challenge events in the past, InspireNC is looking toward running our next event in the coming month. As such we wanted to get feedback from the community regarding possible event dates and some new things we’d like to incorporate in this year’s edition.

We’d greatly appreciate hearing from you at this form: https://forms.gle/aRenJsT64BjHp1S97

Also, please join our discord server for more updates/discussion: https://discord.gg/6Qv4zkKs

We’re excited to see the amazing robots y’all will be designing this time around!
